name: It's all about the coin (LizardLiya)
description:
Why we need timetravel?

In our game it is the only one way to get potion of eternal life - your king order you to find it. But even one little action in the past can lead to big changes in the future. And nobody promise, that they will be good.

You will run into fight for king’s power, economic problems and even devastation of town.

Everything is result of your actions.

You can even loop reality - just try our game!

The game was created by four people during gamejam Ludum Dare 47.
